thickness.label: Thickness
thickness.info: Visible when opacity is larger than zero.

border_radius.label: Border radius
border_radius.info: If the border is turned off, this setting will be applied to product images.

heading_font_weight.label: Heading font weight
heading_font_weight.info: Only works well when font thickness is generated automatically.

buttons.label: Buttons
buttons.info: Buttons are always visible on devices that do not support mouse hover.

cart_button_text.label: Cart button text
cart_button_text.info: If you set it to "Adapt", the theme will display text or icons based on the width of areas that display product cards.

truncate_heading.label: Number of truncated lines
truncate_heading.info: Adjust the number of lines of the product heading you want to display. Leave zero to display the full heading.

explain_custom_badge_metafield.content: Use product metafields to render all custom badges. Enter your metafield and namespace. Example: "my_fields.new". The metafield type requires the "single line text" type. [Learn more about metafields.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/metafields/metafield-definitions/metafield-definition-parts)

color_scheme_body.label: Color scheme of body
color_scheme_body.info: Some sections will be rendered in an individual color scheme.

background_input.label: Input field background
background_input.info: Also used as background for select boxes, mobile menu, media, and product page.

background_button.label: Solid button background
background_button.info: Also used to outline button text and highlight the color of some elements like bubble cart and active filters.

type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

auto_generate_font_weight.label: Automatically generate font thickness
auto_generate_font_weight.info: Turn off this option to load font thickness based on your selected fonts.

collection.label: Collection
collection.info: Visible when cart drawer is empty.

free_shipping_threshold.label: Free shipping minimum amount
free_shipping_threshold.info: Enter the amount value in your store main currency.

color_swatches_shape.label: Color swatches shape
color_swatches_shape.info: Configure the background color for each color swatch in the "Color swatches" section.

popups.name: Dropdowns and pop-ups
popups.paragraph: Affects areas like navigation dropdowns, pop-up modals, and cart pop-ups.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

read_rating_data_from_app.label: Read rating data from app
read_rating_data_from_app.info: If you choose "Standard metafields", the theme will display ratings based on metafield definitions for "reviews.rating_count" and "reviews.rating".

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

paragraph__grid.content: Affects areas with a multicolumn layout.

instruction.content: Not apply on the home page and product page.

color_text_on_image.label: Color text on banner image
color_text_on_image.info: Apply when the banner image is not blank.

overlay_color.label: Overlay color
overlay_color.info: Only visible when the banner image is not blank.

use_collection_image.label: Use collection image
use_collection_image.info: Override the banner image with the collection's featured image if exist.

enable_breadcrumns.label: Enable breadcrumbs
enable_breadcrumns.info: Breadcrumbs will not be shown on the homepage.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-collection-show-product-rating)

inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
inventory_threshold.info: Choose 0 to always show in stock if available.

colors.label: Color scheme
colors.has_cards_info: To change the card color scheme, update your theme settings.

color_swatches_style.label: Color swatches style
color_swatches_style.info: Configure custom color in the "Color swatches" section.

background_image_section.label: Background image section
background_image_section.info: Not applicable in section box layout.

swipe_on_tablet_mobile.label: Enable swipe on tablet and mobile

enable_compare.label: Enable compare button
enable_compare.info: Configure settings for the comparison feature in "Theme Settings" > "PRODUCT COMPARE". Edit the product compare popup in the "Product compare" section.

expiration_message.label: Expiration message
expiration_message.info: Only shows this message when the countdown timer is over.

hide_when_empty_image.label: Hide the section on the storefront when the image is empty

keep_ltr_content_direction.label: Keep LTR content direction in RTL layout

enable_parallax_scrolling_effect.label: Enable parallax scrolling effect
enable_parallax_scrolling_effect.info: Only works when an image is presented.
enable_parallax_scrolling_effect.info_for_background: Only works with the background image.

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

card_styles.label: Card style
card_styles.info: Product, collection, and blog card styles can be updated in theme settings.

image_padding.label: Use original image ratio
image_padding.info: Select if you don't want your image to be cropped.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.info: Video plays in a pop-up if the section contains other blocks.
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

image_padding.label: Use original image ratio
image_padding.info: Select if you don't want your image to be cropped.

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video-block)

drawer_size.label: Desktop drawer size
drawer_size.info: Drawer size is automatically optimized for tablet and mobile.

recommended_collection_list.label: Recommended collection list
recommended_collection_list.info: Visible when the cart is empty.

show_free_shipping_bar.label: Show free shipping bar
show_free_shipping_bar.info: Configure free shipping bar in Theme settings > Cart > Free shipping.

enable_color_swatches.label: Enable color swatches
enable_color_swatches.info: Only work when the Variant picker type is set to "Pills". Configure the color name in "Theme settings" > "Variant pills".

color_swatches_style.label: Color swatches style
color_swatches_style.info: Configure custom color in the "Color swatches" section.

image_ratio.label: Image ratio
image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

full_width.label: Make items full width
full_width.info: Not implemented in section box layout.

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown

show_products_count.label: Show the number of products in a collection

card_circle.label: Display the card image in a circle

custom_image.label: Custom image
custom_image.info: Leave empty to show the collection's featured image.

custom_title.label: Custom title
custom_title.info: Leave empty to show the collection's title.

hide_when_empty_content.label: Hide the section on the storefront when all tabs are empty

information_id.label: Information id
information_id.info: Identifies the information that you're collecting. Example: telephone, address,...

options.label: Options
options.info: Only used in checkbox or dropdown field type. Use semicolon characters to separate multi values. Leave empty to use the boolean value.

required.label: Required field
required.info: Not work in the checkbox type with multi values.

instruction.content: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

show_content_first_in_desktop.label: Show content first on desktop
show_content_first_in_desktop.info: Content first is always the default mobile and tablet layout

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

post_limit.label: Number of blog posts to show

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if blog includes more blog posts than shown

columns_desktop.label: Number of columns on desktop
columns_desktop.info: If the banner image is not blank, only show up to 3 columns per row on desktop.

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" if collection has more products than shown

image_position_desktop.label: Image position on desktop
image_position_desktop.info: Image will be shown below the product list on mobile and tablet.

show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-collection-show-product-rating)

enable_quick_buy.label: Enable quick add button
enable_quick_buy.info: Optimal with popup or drawer cart type.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-product-rating)

media_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

hide_variants.label: Hide unselected variants’ media on desktop

hide_when_empty_content.label: Hide the section on the storefront when the product is empty

show_rating.label: Show product rating

enable_quick_buy.label: Enable quick add button
enable_quick_buy.info: Optimal with popup or drawer cart type.

desktop_image_width.label: Desktop image width

flexible_columns_layout.label: Desktop columns layout

options_2.label: Grid and 2 equal columns in an odd row

options_3.label: Grid and 2 equal columns in an even row

flexible_columns_layout.info: Only visible on tablet and desktop screens.

auto_fit.label: Automatically expand the last columns to fill the remaining space

button_size.label: Button size
button_size.info: Not apply for the link style.

button_background.label: Button background
button_background.info: Also used for outline button text.

heading.label: Heading

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: Heading required to display the menu.

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header__9.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

color_scheme_bottom.label: Bottom color scheme
color_scheme_bottom.info: If the bottom color scheme has the same footer color scheme, the input field background will be used as the background color to make a difference.

logo_position.label: Desktop logo position
logo_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

top_color_scheme.label: Top header color scheme
top_color_scheme.info: Top header contains small texts, language picker and currency picker.

enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header
enable_sticky_header.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.

sticky_header.label: Sticky header
sticky_header.info: Need to enable the sticky header

logo_in_transparent.label: Logo image
logo_in_transparent.info: Displayed when transparent header is enabled. Also works in the transparent header on collection pages.

currency_info.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

language_info.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

enable_social_links.label: Enable social links
enable_social_links.info: Configure social links in Theme settings > Social media.

customer_support_region_header.info: Add region item in section blocks with type "Supported region".

customer_support_region_instruction.content: On the desktop screen, the customer support region is only visible when the logo position on desktop is set to "Top left" or "Middle left, navigation left".

show_go_to_link.label: Add "Go to" links to dropdown menus on touch devices.
show_go_to_link.info: Add the link of a parent item in the submenu.

trigger.label: Mega menu trigger
trigger.info: Enter the name of the menu item you'd like to apply a mega menu.

title.label: Menu item name
title.info: This field is only used to help you find the items in Theme Settings easily. It will not be shown at the storefront.

brand_link.label: Custom link
brand_link.info: Leave empty to use an automatically generated link of the format /collections/vendors?q=<brand_name>

type_link.label: Custom link
type_link.info: Leave empty to use an automatically generated link of the format /collections/types?q=<type_name>

trigger.label: Menu badge trigger
trigger.info: Enter the name of the menu item you'd like to show the badge.

desktop_row_height.label: Desktop row height
desktop_row_height.info: Adjust the height in a single row on desktop and tablet.

hide_when_empty_content.label: Hide the section on the storefront when all blocks are empty
hide_when_empty_content.info: On the storefront, hide the section when Image banners are without images, video blocks without video, and text-only blocks without text and heading. Useful when working with metafields.

column.label: Column
column.info: Column is automatically optimized for mobile.

row.label: Row
row.info: Leave zero to display adapt to the content.

desktop_narrow_content.label: Narrow content layout on desktop
desktop_narrow_content.info: Only works when the column is set to be greater than 1.

color_button.label: Button background
color_button.info: Also used for outline button text and link.

video_hosted.label: A Shopify-hosted video
video_hosted.info: Video plays in the page. Leave empty to play the Youtube or Vimeo video.

video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

video_hosted.info: Video plays in the page. The video will automatically repeat without a control bar.

description.label: Video alt text

blur_background.info: Only works when border spacing is set larger than zero.

columns_mobile.label: Number of columns on mobile
columns_mobile.info: If the text position is set to "Left" or "Right", mobile will always show in 1 column.

open_link_in_new_tab.label: Open the link in a new tab

columns_desktop.label: Number of cards per row on desktop

columns_tablet.label: Number of cards per row on tablet

auto_fit.label: Automatically expand the last cards per row to fill the remaining space
auto_fit.info: Only works when the swipe feature is turned off.

columns_mobile.label: Number of cards per row on mobile
columns_mobile.info: If the text position is set to "Left" or "Right", mobile will always show in 1 card per row.

background_image_overlay_color.label: Background image overlay color
background_image_overlay_color.info: Only visible when the background image section is not blank. 3 first options are colors from the selected color scheme.

image.label: Image
image.info: Image is only shown when the "Media type" is set to "Image".

icon.info: Icon is only shown when the "Media type" is set to "Icon".

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers)

desktop_image_width.label: Desktop image width
desktop_image_width.info: Image is automatically optimized for mobile.

layout.label: Desktop image placement
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

colors_on_background_header.content: Colors on the background image section

colors_on_background_instruction.content: Override text colors when the background image section is visible.

colors_text.label: Text color
colors_text.info: Also used for the input background.

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers)

image_height.label: Banner height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

show_text_below.label: Show content below image on mobile
show_text_below.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers)

content_position.label: Content position
content_position.info: Content will be shown below image on mobile

expiration_time.label: Expiration date
expiration_time.info: When a customer ticks the checkbox to hide pop-ups while browsing your store, you can configure how many days the pop-ups should be shown again.

accessibility.label: Popup description
accessibility.info: Describe the popup for customers using screen readers.

paragraph__1.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/themes/development/recommended-products)

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-recommendations-section-settings)

enable_quick_buy.label: Enable quick add button
enable_quick_buy.info: Optimal with popup or drawer cart type.

desktop_content_position.label: Desktop content position
desktop_content_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

desktop_content_width.label: Desktop content width
desktop_content_width.info: Content width is automatically optimized for mobile.

button_label_1.label: First button label
button_label_1.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Second button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

video_hosted.label: A Shopify-hosted video
video_hosted.info: Video plays in the page. Leave empty to play the Youtube or Vimeo video.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

hide_when_empty_video.label: Hide the section on the storefront when there is no video

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your cover image to be cropped.

show_text_below.label: Show content below images on mobile

accessibility.label: Slideshow description
accessibility.info: Describe the slideshow for customers using screen readers.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Use the shortcode [price] to show the price. You can add the price's value in the below input.  Leave the label blank to hide the button.

price.label: Price
price.info: Enter the amount value in your store main currency.

box_align.label: Desktop content position
box_align.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

desktop_image_width.label: Image width on desktop
desktop_image_width.info: Only works when the "Slide height" on desktop is not set to "Adapt to first image".

desktop_image_position.label: Image position on desktop
desktop_image_position.info: Visible when "Image width on desktop" is set to "Half"

colors_button.label: Button background
colors_button.info: Also used for outline button text, the link, and the starting price label.

colors_background.label: Background color
colors_background.info_desktop: Visible when the image is transparent or the "Image with desktop" setting is set to "Half width".
colors_background.info_mobile: Visible when the image is transparent or content is shown below the image.

container_color_scheme.label: Container color scheme
container_color_scheme.info: Visible when Layout is set to Row or Section container.

desktop_layout.label: Desktop layout
desktop_layout.info: Image is always first on mobile.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

image.label: Image
image.info: Display when you do not wish to provide an API key or coordinates.

api_key_description.content: Make sure that you have the Google Maps API Key properly set in Theme Settings.

api_library.label: API library
api_library.info: Depending on your choice, you must enable the corresponding APIs you choose to use with your project. [Learn how to enable and disable APIs](https://support.google.com/googleapi/answer/6158841?hl=en).

map_height.label: Map height
map_height.info: The map height is automatically optimized for mobile.

map_type.label: Map type
map_type.info: Defines type of map tiles to load.

map_zoom.label: Zoom
map_zoom.info: Sets initial zoom level of the map.

button_link.label: Button link
button_link.info: Only apply when the coordinates is empty.

accessibility.label: Google Maps description
accessibility.info: Describe the map for customers using screen readers.

overlapping_content_layout.label: Overlapping content layout on desktop and tablet

scrolling_speed.label: Scrolling speed on tablet and mobile

hide_when_empty_content.label: Hide the section on the storefront when all texts are empty

instruction.content: You need to enable the search suggestions feature in Theme settings > Search behavior.
You need to enable the Recently viewed products feature in Theme settings > Recently viewed products. There, you can configure product cards in this section.
Place this section directly in front of the section you want to move up. Adjust the distance you want to move on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
